description:
The main protagonist of the series.
Born as a child of a sake-brewery family, he come to Nerima University to continue his study. At first, he got interest on Mami Manami; even successully confess and become her boyfriend. But after fews months of dating, Mami dumped him and said she love someone else. After being devasted, he start to use an app named "Rental Girlfriend". His first choice is a girl name Mizuhara Chizuru. After the dated, he unexpetedly found out she also came to the same college and also his neighbour. At first he still want Mami come back to him, but after some incident happened, he start to develop feelings for Chizuru.
name: Kinoshita Kazuya
